detectors.description:
MTVRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MTVRewards__1.sol#723-739) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MTVRewards__1.sol#729)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MTVRewards__1.sol#732)
